info.title: Partner to PickUpPoint
info.description: This document contains the technical information about Woop APIs for pick-up point. For any questions or clarifications, please contact the internal technical team. To use Woop APIs, you must use the confidential access codes. The version currently available in the documentation is Version 1.0.0

401.description: Unauthorized - You are not allowed to access this item.

404.description: Bad Request - Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

get.description: Retrieve the information of the external booking with the matching booking ID.

401.description: Unauthorized - The booking cannot be cancelled

403.description: Forbidden - the booking has already been cancelled

404.description: Not Found - the booking does not exist

delete.description: API to delete an external booking.

patch.description: Patch the necessary fields for the API to modify an external booking.

requestBody.description: Post the necessary fields for the API to create a new booking.

get.description: Retrieve the information from all external bookings

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

401.description: You are not allowed to access this item.

requestBody.description:
The method works like a search engine based on mandatory criteria, two options :
 1) with latitude and Longitude
 2) with postalCode

post.description:
This method retrieves the list of relay-point for all the carriers associed to your account.

Search options enable you to refine the method's eligibility engine. The more options there are, the more precise the results will be.

You can search for a relay-point based on the contents of the customer basket (parcel dimensions: length, width, height and weight). This allows you to suggest delivery points capable of receiving parcels of a certain weight.

postPickupPointsWithPostalCode.description: Specifies the information for a relay point search with postalCode
postPickupPointsWithPostalCode.title: Search relay point with postalCode

offset.description: offset to display the pickup points

kilometricDistance.description: Distance in kilometres from the search radius

depositDate.description: Estimated drop-off date at the relay point

countryCode.description: Country code (ISO 3166 alpha-2). View list : [Country code.md]

postPickupPointsWithGeoPoint.description: Specifies the information for a relay point search with latitude and longitude
postPickupPointsWithGeoPoint.title: Search relay point with latitude and longitude

offset.description: offset to display the pickup points

kilometricDistance.description: Distance in kilometres from the search radius

depositDate.description: Estimated drop-off date at the relay point

countryCode.description: Country code (ISO 3166 alpha-2). View list : [Country code.md]

errorCodeResponse.title: Error code (errorCode)
errorCodeResponse.description: Corresponds to the model returned in the event of an API error.

postPickupPoints.description: OK. Contains the retrieved relay points.

address.description: Full address of the relay point

openingHours.description: Opening hours of the relay point

closingDates.description: List of temporary closure dates of the relay point
